gov.nih.nlm.ling.util

Class FileUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.nih.nlm.ling.util.FileUtils

  • public class FileUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    A collection of utility methods for dealing with file IO.
    Author:
    Halil Kilicoglu

                                                   throws java.io.IOException
        Loads properties from a configuration file.
        Parameters:
        filename - the name of the properties file
        Returns:
        the properties in the file
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if there is problem with file IO

      • listFiles

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.String> listFiles(java.lang.String dirName,
                                                         boolean isRecursive,
                                                         java.lang.String ext)
                                                  throws java.io.IOException
        Lists all files in a directory with a given extension.
        Parameters:
        dirName - the name of the directory
        isRecursive - whether subdirectories should be considered
        ext - the file extension
        Returns:
        the list of file names meeting the criterion
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if there is problem with file IO

      • stringFromFile

        public static java.lang.String stringFromFile(java.lang.String filename)
                                       throws java.io.IOException
        Returns the text content of a file. It assumes UTF-8 as the encoding.
        Parameters:
        filename - the file name
        Returns:
        the text content of the file
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if there is problem with file IO

      • stringFromFile

        public static java.lang.String stringFromFile(java.lang.String filename,
                                              java.lang.String encoding)
                                       throws java.io.IOException
        Similar to stringFromFile(String), except this method allows specifying the encoding.
        Parameters:
        filename - the file name
        encoding - encoding to use
        Returns:
        the text content of the file
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if there is problem with file IO

      • stringFromStream

        public static java.lang.String stringFromStream(java.io.InputStream stream,
                                                java.lang.String encoding)
                                         throws java.io.IOException
        Similar to stringFromFile(String,String), except this method takes a stream as input.
        Parameters:
        stream - the input stream to use
        encoding - encoding to use
        Returns:
        the text content of the stream
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if there is problem with reading the stream

      • stringFromFileWithBytes

        public static java.lang.String stringFromFileWithBytes(java.lang.String filename,
                                                       java.lang.String encoding)
                                                throws java.io.IOException
        Similar to stringFromFile(String,String), but this method reads the file as bytes.
        Parameters:
        filename - the file name
        encoding - encoding to use
        Returns:
        the text content of the file
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if there is problem with file IO

      • linesFromFile

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.String> linesFromFile(java.lang.String filename,
                                                             java.lang.String encoding)
                                                      throws java.io.IOException
        Similar to stringFromFile(String,String), except this method returns the content as a list of lines.
        Parameters:
        filename - the file name
        encoding - encoding to use
        Returns:
        the text content of the file as a list of lines
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if there is problem with file IO

      • linesFromStream

                                                        throws java.io.IOException
        Similar to linesFromFile(String,String), but this method reads in a stream.
        Parameters:
        stream - the input stream
        encoding - encoding to use
        Returns:
        the text content of the file as a list of lines
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if there is problem with file IO

      • readLineInteractively

        public static java.lang.String readLineInteractively()
        Reads an interactive line.
        Returns:
        the text on the interactive line, or null if no text can be read

      • write

        public static void write(java.lang.String outText,

                         java.lang.String encoding)
                  throws java.io.IOException
        Writes textual content to a file.
        Parameters:
        outText - the textual content
        outFile - the file to write to
        encoding - the encoding to use
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if there is a problem with writing to file

      • write

        public static void write(java.lang.String outText,
                         java.io.File outFile)
                  throws java.io.IOException
        Similar to write(String, File, String), but UTF8 encoding is assumed.
        Parameters:
        outText - the textual content
        outFile - the file to write to
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if there is a problem with writing to file
